145b4(mdo sde): thos par gyur te/ chos kyi gtam can ni tshig mnyan par 'os pa/ tshig gzung bar 'os pa/ snyan pa sna tshogs kyi gtam can dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang / de zang zing gi
145b5(mdo sde): slad du chos ston te/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma lags/ gang las de'i gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams mchi bar 'gyur ba de
145b6(mdo sde): dag la chos ston gyi/ sems can gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dang ba mang ba legs par bshad pa'i don 'tshal bar nus shing stobs dang ldan pa zang zing gis de rjes su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa de dag la chos
145b7(mdo sde): mi ston pa dang / gang dag de la 'gyed par bgyid pa ni dman pa dman par gyur pa/ gti mug gi rang bzhin can/ chos rgya chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston pa dang / de zang zing gis sngags
146a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyud des/ gang dag chos bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston pa dang / gang dag bstan par bgyi ba de dag la mi ston pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan
146a2(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa dang rab tu mi ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste brgyad pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa yongs su tshol te/ de gzhan
146a3(mdo sde): dag la zab mo'i bka' mchid kyi rgyun bkum nas/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs ston te/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i bka' mchid ston pas/ 'jig rten dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba'i
146a4(mdo sde): tshig dang / lan gyi tshig la mkhas pas/ sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/ de la legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba yang gsol bar 'gyur la/ des kyang byang chub sems dpa' yi rangs par 'gyur
146a5(mdo sde): ba dang / lha'i bu gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos zab mo la mos pa/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dus par gyur pa de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yi ma rangs nas gang 'jig rten gyi dga'
146a6(mdo sde): pas mngon par dga' ba'i sems can de dag la zab mo'i gtam gyi rgyun bcad de/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam sna tshogs ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di ni dam pa'i chos nub par byed pa yin gyi/ dam pa'i chos
146a7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don zab mo'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung gi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam sna tshogs kyi phyir ma yin no zhes mchi zhing
146b1(mdo sde): 'khor de nas mchi ngar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i cho ga smra'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs bgyid kyi/ zab mo'i bka' mchid/
146b2(mdo sde): 'chab pa de ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid zab mo 'chab cing 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa dang rab tu
146b3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste dgu pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po gang dag de la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams
146b4(mdo sde): las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa
146b5(mdo sde): zlog pa dang / rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang / don nyung zhing bgyid pa nyung ba la sbyor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la rgyun tu mang du ston pa dang / theg pa
146b6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la bsnyen cing rten/ bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pas theg pa chen po las ldang ba de'i tshe/
146b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za bar zhal ta byed par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor la/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor ba de'i tshe/
147a1(mdo sde): dben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i sa nye bar ston/ byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag par/ yang dag phul gang lags
147a2(mdo sde): pa de dag de la mi ston to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag par yang dag phul de dag gang lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag
147a3(mdo sde): phul lags so/ / bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i rtsa ba la rab tu gnas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / mgo dang
147a4(mdo sde): gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa la gnas te yang dag pa'i brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / bag mchis par las bgyis pa
147a5(mdo sde): chung mi gzon pa dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang // mtshan
147a6(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i slad du/ bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i
147a7(mdo sde): slad du/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sas mi gos par bgyi ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
147b1(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi sa las shin tu bzla ba'i slad du/ thabs la mkhas pa yongs su tshol ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las yang dag pa yang dag phul
147b2(mdo sde): lags te/ gang dag la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bgyi ba de de dag de la mi ston pa dang / de la 'di skad du byang chub ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i yin gyi
147b3(mdo sde): le lo can gyi ma yin no/ / gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/ phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
147b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes mchi la/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis na/
147b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal
147b6(mdo sde): gyis rengs par gyur te/ de nga rgyal des bla ma rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams dang / pha ma dang slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams dang / de las gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu bdud
147b7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing / de la ma gus par gyur pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhas pa khyad par thob pa/ gzungs dang spob
148a1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan du mi mchi/ mi bsnyen mi bsten/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/ yongs su mi 'dri/ yongs
148a2(mdo sde): su 'dri bar mi stsol cing / de ma thos pa'i chos nyan par mi bgyid/ thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag
148a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa/ chos ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / de dman pa la sten cing khyad par dang bral ba 'di lta ste/
148a4(mdo sde): zhan pa'i 'gro ba/ blun pa/ 'on pa/ lkugs pa'i 'gro ba/ 'gro ba dman pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis
148a5(mdo sde): gram pa'i sa phyogs su shing tsam pa ka bskrun bskrun la/ chab stsol bar mi bgyid kyi/ gang nas chab mchi bar mthong ba'i phyogs de yang gor ma dang / gyo mo dag gis bkum na bcom ldan 'das de ltar
148a6(mdo sde): na zhugs shing tsam ka chab dang bral ba de la yal ga dang / lo ma dang yal ga phre'u ma chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u chags pa rnams kyang
148a7(mdo sde): skams ste/ dog sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems bskyed la/ nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyi rengs par gyur na/ de dge
148b1(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos mnyan pa dang bral te/ ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mo nyan thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das
148b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchi bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhol ba'i phyogs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de gzhol ba'i slad du/ chu klung thams cad dang / chab mig dang / 'bab
148b3(mdo sde): chu thams cad tshegs chung ngus der 'bab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la gus pa yang tshegs chung ngus chos zab mo'i sgo
148b4(mdo sde): rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur ro/ / de dran pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs/ nga rgyal gyis rengs par
148b5(mdo sde): gyur te/ bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu mi 'dud cing / 'dud par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyus zin par rig
148b6(mdo sde): par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs
148b7(mdo sde): bzang zhing / mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang / longs spyod che zhing nor mang la/ mdzod dang bang ba mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / rus dang / rigs dang /
149a1(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor dang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson zhing de gzugs dang / longs spyod dang /
149a2(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug gi stobs kyis rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/
149a3(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/ gdugs dang bser mas sha dang khrag bskams pa/ skem pa nyam chung ba/ lus rtsas yog pa/ mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar nga
149a4(mdo sde): bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la skems shing nyam chung la/ mdog ngan cing mi sdug par
149a5(mdo sde): rig nas/ brnyas par bya'o snyam du sems shing de dag las legs par bshad pa nyan mi 'tshal gyi/ de de bas shas cher dman zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das
149a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rgyags pa dang / bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gnyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
149a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tu ma 'das na/ tha na rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
149b1(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
149b2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o// // bam po bcu pa ste tha ma'o//
149b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag
149b4(mdo sde): legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/ / blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag gang la gnas na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams
149b5(mdo sde): cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshad do/ / blo gros rgya mtsho bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya
149b6(mdo sde): mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas/
149b7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher byams pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang po'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos
150a1(mdo sde): thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang yongs su thar bar byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba 'di ni/ bdud
150a2(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o/ / blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang sems can thams cad yongs su
150a3(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/
150a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o// blo gros rgya
150a5(mdo sde): mtsho chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu
150a6(mdo sde): gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo lnga pa'o/ / blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ gti mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs
150a7(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
150b1(mdo sde): med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams
150b2(mdo sde): cad ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba spangs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la
150b3(mdo sde): chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo brgyad pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni ngang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ dang mnyam zhing bye brag
150b4(mdo sde): med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / theg pa chen po'i bsam pa yongs su mi 'dor bar sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rnam pa dgod pa'i chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i
150b5(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o/ / blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa la yang mi gnas la/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed/ rtsom pa thams cad
150b6(mdo sde): dang yang bral la/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba'i rtsom pa yang mi 'dor/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang shin tu 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang mi ldog pa 'di ni
150b7(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bcu pa'o/ / blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste/ byang chub
151a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag la rab tu sbyor na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
151a2(mdo sde): pa na/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur te/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzod
151a3(mdo sde): spu nas 'od rab tu byung bas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can
151a4(mdo sde): gyis ltas rgya chen po 'di mthong nas rings shing myur bar la gor du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/ bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du
151a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i bkod pa de 'dra bas dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus der
151a6(mdo sde): de bsgribs par gyur te/ 'ongs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dul bar gyur pa rnams dang /
151a7(mdo sde): gang dag srid par kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
151b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud sdig can bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
151b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho bdud sdig can 'di ni chos kyis rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir 'ongs nad ci zhig bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng 'di bde
151b3(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phang bar bgyi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so//
151b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ga la yod/ de na chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bya/ blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i
151b5(mdo sde): bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba chos ston to/
151b6(mdo sde): / de ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa
151b7(mdo sde): zhes bya zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bde ba'i rgyu dang yon tan gyi rgyu dang / bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/
152a1(mdo sde): de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
152a2(mdo sde): rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa des byang chub thob pa de'i tshe/ de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus las bdud kun tu bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas/
152a3(mdo sde): 'od zer des bskul bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bdud bye ba phrag brgya 'khod pa/ bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bya ba brgya phrag bcu yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste
152a4(mdo sde): phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar bsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed ma nus te/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so//
152a5(mdo sde): des kyang ji ltar de dag bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de phyis byang chub thob
152a6(mdo sde): ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya'o// de byang chub thob pa'i mchog gi phrugs dang / bzang po'i phrugs kyang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
152a7(mdo sde): so/ / rim gro pa yang bdud las brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' shig yang dag
152b1(mdo sde): par rab tu ston te/ de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med de/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/ der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi las byed par mi
152b2(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ bdud las brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
152b3(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can sngangs skrag 'jigs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na/ 'gro ma nus te/ mi snang bar ma gyur nas/ de de bas kyang cher sngangs shing skrag ste/ bcom ldan
152b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyab tu
152b5(mdo sde): gsol/ bde bar gshegs la bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag ni/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe
152b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin no/ / sdig can khyod byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzod pa gsol cig dang / 'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can gyis
152b7(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol// bdag bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan
153a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der mi 'phangs par gsol/ ji ltar gang na skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu chos ston par 'gyur ba'i 'khor der bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du/ lan 'ga'
153a2(mdo sde): yang mchi bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ / blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ sdig can kho bo lta bu dag la gzod pa gsol mi dgos so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams
153a3(mdo sde): cad la shin tu bzod pa nyid do/ / sdig can khyod bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'dzin rten gyi khams der song la/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bkod pa de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das
153a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la ltos shig dang / khyod la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos lag pa g.yas pa
153a5(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdud sdig can gyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang / slob dpon chos kyi
153a6(mdo sde): dadepe mkhyud med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshi ga des bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi yang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byas so//
153a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig de skad ces spras ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen
153b1(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par drug tu g.yos par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlabs kyis skad
153b2(mdo sde): cig thang cig yud tsam de la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to/ / de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
153b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
153b4(mdo sde): tu 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag
153b5(mdo sde): gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dbang chung zhing
153b6(mdo sde): mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi
153b7(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
154a1(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ / 'tsho'o// gzhes so// de 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to// yang dag par rab tu 'chad do// der phyogs bcu nas byang chub
154a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshad med grangs med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems
154a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la yongs su 'dri zhing yongs su 'drir 'jug pa yang 'dus par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs
154a4(mdo sde): de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig can mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ongs pa dang / skyes bu dam pa de'i 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste/ bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi
154a5(mdo sde): khams 'dir 'phangs so/ / de nas bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/ sdig
154a6(mdo sde): can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag kyang bdud du gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa
154a7(mdo sde): las/ kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de lta bas na sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
154b1(mdo sde): bskyed cig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyi lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis/ bla na med pa
154b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ phyin chad bdud kyi las mi bya'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod pa
154b3(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri la bzhag ste/ / de nas 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gtam rgyud ci 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba btab bo//
154b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gang bdud sdig can seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i kha'i sgo dang / ba spu'i khung thams cad nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'dus pa
154b5(mdo sde): chen po'i le'u rab tu bshad pa lta bu'i gtam byung ste/ yi ge de dag dang tshig dang / yi ge'i 'bru de dag dang mnyam zhing mi nyung mi mang ma lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs byas so//
154b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u gtam thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
154b7(mdo sde): bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho de dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas
155a1(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pas mdzod spu nas/ gzugs
155a2(mdo sde): thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer phyung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed de dag las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di snang ba chen
155a3(mdo sde): pos khyab par gyur to/ / der byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bskal pa brgyar yang bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin/
155a4(mdo sde): pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston
155a5(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yang mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas pa 'di yang mthong ngo // de na sgrib pa ci yang
155a6(mdo sde): med par mthong ngo / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad+ma dag la 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // mthong
155a7(mdo sde): nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der logs su me tog gtor to// gtor ma
155b1(mdo sde): / thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi gdugs chen por gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ me tog
155b2(mdo sde): gi gdugs de mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang me tog gi gdugs 'di lta bur gyur pa'i me tog 'di dag gang nas mchis
155b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag me tog 'di dag ni bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nga la mchod
155b4(mdo sde): pa'i las kyi phyir gtor to/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud
155b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na ci bgyid pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ byang
155b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu
155b7(mdo sde): 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can de 'khor 'di la ston cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu las 'od
156a1(mdo sde): gzer stong phrag bcu phyung nas/ 'od gzer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag las 'das nas bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
156a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
156a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can chos kyi khri chen po la 'dug ste/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas
156a4(mdo sde): kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/
156a5(mdo sde): de dag gis mu tig dang me tog gis gtor to// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chen por gnas par
156a6(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo / / de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi
156a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan du mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ de nas
156b1(mdo sde): bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bro gros rgya/
156b2(mdo sde): mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis skad cig thang cig yul tsam de las mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
156b3(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas
156b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa
156b5(mdo sde): ti'i bu bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yongs su dag pa de mthong ste/ ji ltar dag cing dri ma med pa'i sems can mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas de ngo mtshar to// bdag gis de
156b6(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ khyod ci yang bdud
156b7(mdo sde): kyi las blta byed dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang gis kyang bdud kyi las byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
157a1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud las byed pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos stongs dang ldan zhing
157a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed pa de nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su brjod kyi
157a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi las ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par
157a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang bdud kyi bu khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag
157a5(mdo sde): cag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa der skye bar gyur cig ces tshig de skad smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi
157a6(mdo sde): zhing kun tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
157a7(mdo sde): pab rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni bar chad mang ba/ phyir rgol ba mang ba lags na/ gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang
157b1(mdo sde): gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa de dag la yang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di
157b2(mdo sde): dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
157b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / ston par 'gyur zhing 'don pa/
157b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu
157b5(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / tshig gang dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed
157b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po bzhi dgugs pa'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o/ / blo gros rgya mtsho dgug pa'i chog de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa me sa ma san d+hi/ sa ra ne/ sa ra pa ti/
157b7(mdo sde): d+ha ne/ d+ha na/ ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu ma ti/ A ba te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ dir dze/ ka ka re/ kA ru Ne/ hu hu/ hu hu ba ti/ hu hu san d+hi/ nir g+ha ta ni/ a ba rdza
158a1(mdo sde): bI ba Te/ mad+hu ma ti/ ma ri dzi ti/ bi shud d+he/ bi shud d+ha pa ti/ mi so le/ ma nor ha re/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni/ dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te
158a2(mdo sde): tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig 'di
158a3(mdo sde): rnams chos smra ba des legs par kha ton tu byas te/ phyogs bzhir byams pas khyab par byas la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bsams na sngags kyi chog 'di dag gis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug
158a4(mdo sde): nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
158a5(mdo sde): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par gang na yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
158a6(mdo sde): 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba der/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongs su gzung ba dang / ci nas gang gis kyang ma bsgribs pa 'am/ gnod pa bgyid par mi
158a7(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgugs pa'i tshig brjod par bya ste/ tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro//
158b1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dza ye/ dza ya ma ti/ ad Te/ mad Te/ mang ku re/ sid+d+ha ma ti/ shu b+h+re/ shAn ti ka re/ na da ne/ dAn te/
158b2(mdo sde): dAn tam ti/ tad ka re/ k+Sha 9/ k+Sha ya mu khe/ a bad Ta ni/ bi bad Ta ni/ ba ri bad Ta ni/ ba ri tshi de d+h+ri ti/ hr-i ti san d+hi/ a gats+tsha ko ru shi ka/ ni dzi tra/ a su ra/ dza yan ti ba/
158b3(mdo sde): sa ma ya ste/ a rab d+ho/ d+harma ni dzi to/ ra ma hi/ swa s+ye ya na ma/ b+hU tA nA ma/ a rak+Sha d+harma tsa ri na ma/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste de dag gis lha'i dbang po
158b4(mdo sde): brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro/ / der chos smra ba des sngags kyi tshig 'di dag legs par kha ton du byas la gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbra'i cho gas khrus legs par byas te/ gos bzang po bgos la shar
158b5(mdo sde): phyogs su me tog gtor te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams pa'i dran pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
158b6(mdo sde): bsams la/ ko'u shi ka 'khor legs par yongs su bzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog/ sngags grub pa mngon sum du gyis/ de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing yongs su dag la tshul khrims yongs su
158b7(mdo sde): dag pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ongs nas/ 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyur/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
159a1(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung ba dang / yun ring du
159a2(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi/ de'i 'khor kyang yongs su bzhag par bgyi/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos
159a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
159a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstan pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
159a5(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi chos la gus par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs
159a6(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin te/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod kyis
159a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsams na/ lha rnams ni rgyal zhing / lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcad
159b1(mdo sde): pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bya ste/ sngags kyi cho ga de dag gis bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi chog de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sham
159b2(mdo sde): sha ma ba ti/ sha mi ta sha tru/ ang ku re/ mang ku re/ mA ra dzi te/ ku ra Di yu/ ke yu re/ te dzo ba ti/ o lo ya ni/ bi sha tha nirma le/ ma lA ba na ye/ khu khu re/ kha ge gra se/
159b3(mdo sde): gra sa ne/ o mu khi/ pa rA nga mu khI/ A mu khI/ sha mi ta ni/ sarba gra ha ba na d+ha nA ni/ gri hi tA/ sarba mA ra pra bArdi ni/ bi mug tI mA ra bA shA/ s+thA bi ta bud+d+ha mu dra/ a nu da ga ti/ ta sarba
159b4(mdo sde): mA re pu tsa ri te/ pa da pa ri shud d+h+ya/ bi gats+tshan tu sarba mA ra karma Ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho tshig 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa'i chog/ nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig ste/ de dag chos smra ba
159b5(mdo sde): des legs par kha don tu byas la chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/ byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas/ 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la bdag la sman par 'du
159b6(mdo sde): shes bskyed de/ chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang / chos nyan pa la nad pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i
159b7(mdo sde): 'du shes bskyed la/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/ chos kyi gtam byed na/ de'i 'khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mig gis mi rtsol bar
160a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dud sdig can gyis
160a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa/ skyes bu dam pa de dag
160a3(mdo sde): gis byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 'di dag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan chad bdud kyi sug las thams cad 'dor ro// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs
160a4(mdo sde): 'di ston pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / gus pa
160a5(mdo sde): dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pas mchi bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can legs so legs so// khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dis rim gyis bdud
160a6(mdo sde): kyi las thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis thob pa'i chos de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i
160a7(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya ste/ dgug pa'i sngags kyi cho ga de dag gis tshangs pa bkug nas chos smra ba'i gan du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ me tra
160b1(mdo sde): ka re/ ka ru d+hA ka re/ mug ti ta kA re/ u be gak+Sha ka re/ dud+d+ha ka re/ d+ha mA ka re/ sad g+hA ka re/ su kri ta badzi / ma hA bi tA ne/ niwe re/ dAg+he mo dzo da ti/ o jo ga me d+harman da ni/
160b2(mdo sde): br-i ti thA ni/ su ba bad ti/ bi shud+d+he/ gI tsid to pa sha me/ bya ba lo ka ya pra mAn/ b+hud tiSh+Tha/ sa mi d+hi/ a be k+Sha swa d+harmarba rA NAn/ ku ru sad d+harma pa ri gra ha na/ kr-i ta ma nu pA lA ya/ bud+d+ha
160b3(mdo sde): netwe ma ma bya ba tshe/ bA sI/ sma ra ta/ d+harma tsakra pra bar+d+ha nAn/ ku ru sa twa bi sho d+hA nAn/ pra ti gr-i d+ha na d+hArmAn+da/ ga ra mA la tan/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Te na ma mA bi ko pa ya/ blo gros rgya mtsho mi mjed
160b4(mdo sde): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha don du byas la/ tshangs pa'i lam la shin tu gnas te/ zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dbang po shin tu sbas pa
160b5(mdo sde): dang shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang / shin tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang / shin tu bden pas zin pa'i ngag gi las dang / shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang /
160b6(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang / shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / legs par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shin tu bstan pa'i mang du thos pa dang /
160b7(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems las su rung ba dang / shin tu rno ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis legs par zin pa dang /
161a1(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
161a2(mdo sde): las shin tu yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bsams la/ chos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu brjod na/ des bsams ma thag tu tshangs pa
161a3(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i ltas ni 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor thams
161a4(mdo sde): cad byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / dbang po nyams pa med pa dang / gcig la gcig mi gnod par gnas pa dang / chos dang chos smra ba la ston pa dang / bla ma ltar phangs par sems
161a5(mdo sde): pa dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang sems rtse gcig pa dang / mi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang / rus shing ltar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis sems dang /
161a6(mdo sde): rna ba blags te nyan par 'gyur ba'o// chos smra ba de la yang sngon lung ma mnos pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor der mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
161a7(mdo sde): 'ongs par rig par bya'o/ / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'dal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
161b1(mdo sde): 'das bdag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor la/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o//
161b2(mdo sde): chos smra ba de la yang chos brgyad bsgrub par bgyi'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/ chos zab mo rtogs
161b3(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du de la blo gros bsgrub par bgyi/ / don gyi rnam pa rtog par bgyi ba'i slad du de la rtogs par bsgrub par bgyi/ the tsom thams cad gcad pa'i slad du de la spobs pa
161b4(mdo sde): bsgrub par bgyi/ skad dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs par bsgrub par bgyi/ 'khor thams cad zil gyi
161b5(mdo sde): mi non par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la 'dul bar bsrung ba bsgrub par bgyi/ mi dman par lung bstan par bya ba'i slad du/ de la chos kyi snang ba sgrub par bgyi/ de bgyi cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad
161b6(mdo sde): du/ / de la nges 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po 'di dag bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos smra ba de la bsrung zhing sba ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyang yun
161b7(mdo sde): ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ba ltar bdud thams cad dang / phas kyi
162a1(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin
162a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ tha ma'i dus kyi tshe ci nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi ba dang / khong du chud pa dang / glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub
162a3(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba
162a4(mdo sde): btab pa mkhyen nas mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
162a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gzugs su snang ba gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin
162a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ngo / / rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlab pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
162a7(mdo sde): nyid du gnas par kun tu snang ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kye ma'o chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs so// gang
162b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis
162b2(mdo sde): brlabs pa de la bdud thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te chos kyi rnam grangs
162b3(mdo sde): 'di la bar chad bya bar brtun kyang / de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa ni 'gas kyang srid/ rgya mtsho thams cad ni skam yang srid/ rir
162b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni rnam par 'thor yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa'i steng du lhung yang srid/ nam mkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam par bstan du rung yang srid/ me ni chung
162b5(mdo sde): 'gyur yang srid/ chu ni mar 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu byar rung yang srid/ nam mkha' dang sa ni 'byar yang
162b6(mdo sde): srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ni sus kyang bskyod pa 'am/ g.yo ba 'am 'khrugs par byed mi nus so zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
162b7(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba nye bar gzung ste/ chos kyi
163a1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas/
163a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs na de lta ma lags pa/ rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po ltar
163a3(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang / blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/ dge slong kun dga' bo nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa la/ chos kyi le'u 'di
163a4(mdo sde): lta bu 'di yongs su gtad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho dge slong kun dga' bo rang gi blo'i stobs bskyed pas/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa ma yin gyi
163a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzin to/ / blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
163a6(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba yod de/ de dag 'di snyam du/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi 'di ltar nyan thos kyang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni
163a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'khor de nas lha dang mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/
163b1(mdo sde): ci byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dran pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bstan po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni de lta ma yin no//
163b2(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'khor gyi sems can rnams la rnam par bltas te/
163b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di rab tu dran pa dang ldan pa lags kyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos
163b4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
163b5(mdo sde): dag na/ sems can ji tsam sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ni reb tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes gang de skad du/ bya ba de la ji snyam du sems//
163b6(mdo sde): 'od srungs sems can gyi khams de mang ngam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
163b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzung ste/ sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de bzhin du ji ltar dge slong kun dga' bo ltar
164a1(mdo sde): dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang / kun dga' bo lta bu'i sems can de dag gi dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
164a2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i dran pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho ni phyogs
164a3(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyis chos bstan pa la kun
164a4(mdo sde): nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed do/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu'i rgyun gcig gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa
164a5(mdo sde): la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ chu'i rgyun thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs nas/ de la 'grib pa 'am gang ba yang med do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems
164a6(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyis
164a7(mdo sde): chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ de'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa la bri ba 'am gang ba yang med do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong gis/
164b1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur
164b2(mdo sde): cig ces smras so/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lha dang / mi'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la gtor/ mngon par gtor to//
164b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos
164b4(mdo sde): nas mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur
164b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pa la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stong chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni// gser gyis bkang ste bde
164b6(mdo sde): gshegs phul ba bas/ / gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni// mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags// gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang // de bzhin gshegs
164b7(mdo sde): ba rnams la phul ba bas/ / gang gis mdo sde 'di la 'jug byas pa// bsod nams de la snga mas spyad du med// gang gis 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag bcu// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin
165a1(mdo sde): pa bas/ / gang gis mdo 'di bton nas ston pa yi// bsod nams de yi chang ni snga ma min// zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams// rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten slob dpon//
165a2(mdo sde): skyobasangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas// gang gis tshul 'dire rab tu sbyor ba dang // phyogs bcu rnams su gang gA'i bye snyed zhing // ri ni chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas//
165a3(mdo sde): ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'i// bsod nams de la mnyam pa yod ma yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang / chos bsgrub pa dang srog chags snying rje ba/
165a4(mdo sde): chos bzhi 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te// de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs mi gsung ngo // nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams// sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang
165a5(mdo sde): chub sems/ / chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis de thos dogs mi bya// dkon mchog chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bye ba g.yos
165a6(mdo sde): bapar gyur/ / snang ba byung zhing me tog char kyang bab// sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang byung // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun// mgu nas ched du rjod pa ched du brjod//
165a7(mdo sde): chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams// 'tsho ba don yod rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag 'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed//
165b1(mdo sde): gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjod pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bzung // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams// phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu brkyang mdzad de/
165b2(mdo sde): yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni// shAkya seng ges bskul ba legs shes gsung // lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che// brgya byin tshangs pa
165b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ / nam mkhar gnas te ched du rjod pa brjod// shAkya seng ge 'di dang dge 'dun dang / mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring
165b4(mdo sde): gnas gyur/ / legs gsungs chos ni gzhar yang nub ma gyur// gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi// bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas
165b5(mdo sde): par ni/ / kun tu srung zhing sba ba spro bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho chos kyi tshul chos kyi
165b6(mdo sde): phyag rgya chos btus pa/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa chos rab tu dbye ba 'di ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad
165b7(mdo sde): pa'achang pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis de la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / sgrub pa snying por bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
166a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas de dag dang / dge slong gi
166a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// byin gyis brlabs kyi
166a3(mdo sde): le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs s+ho//
166a4(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bud+d+ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang
166a5(mdo sde): bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri brid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
166a6(mdo sde): paklu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
166a7(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems
166b1(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde rtogs par khong du chud pa
166b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad spobs pas mgu bar byed pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ting
166b3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa la snyan par brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis
166b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog
166b5(mdo sde): dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par
166b6(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
166b7(mdo sde): kha spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med par brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongs su mi skyo ba/ seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/
167a1(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
167a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po lhun po dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po dang / lhun po chen po rtse 'dzin dang / lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / spun
167a3(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po dang / lhun po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen tog dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / rin chen dpal dang / rin
167a4(mdo sde): chen 'byung dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen khar ba can dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rin chen dra ba dang / rin chen bkod pa dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang
167a5(mdo sde): rin chen gling dang / rin chen sgron ma dang / lag na rin chen dang / dga' byed dang / chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang / tshig
167a6(mdo sde): bkod pa'i 'od dang / tshig rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / lha brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / 'od gzer stong ldan dang / me lce dang / skar ma la dga' ba
167a7(mdo sde): dang zla 'od dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gser bzangs rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi
167b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med
167b2(mdo sde): drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu
167b3(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams
167b4(mdo sde): dang lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu ded dpon la
167b5(mdo sde): sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs thams cad dang / ra ba tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa'i lha rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa
167b6(mdo sde): tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la sogs pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dge rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'bras
167b7(mdo sde): bu che la sogs pa 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ga nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dri med 'od la sogs pa 'og min
168a1(mdo sde): gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po drug khri dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bzhi khri nyis
168a2(mdo sde): stong dang / dri za'i rgyal po phreng ba thogs pa la sogs pa dri za sum khri nyis stong dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khri nyis stong dang / bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi
168a3(mdo sde): stong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che
168a4(mdo sde): ba stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing / lha thams cad kyi bkod
168a5(mdo sde): pas legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la/ ri'i rgyal po'i ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas gyen tu 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
168a6(mdo sde): mnan nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge zhing bzhugs so// de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs
168a7(mdo sde): pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing / rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs
168b1(mdo sde): des thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to/ / rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan 'phreng 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/
168b2(mdo sde): mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig dri ma med pa dang / gser lta bu'i mu tig dang / zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang / pad+ma lta bu'i mu tig dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i
168b3(mdo sde): mdog can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang ngo / / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng de dag las kyang 'od gzer dag kyang byung ngo // 'od gzer de dag las kyang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog
168b4(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma/ dri zhim pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab bo// me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar
168b5(mdo sde): gyur to/ / bar snang la yang 'brug sgra chen po grags par gyur to// a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab bo//
168b6(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
168b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu
169a1(mdo sde): gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka'
169a2(mdo sde): stsal to/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ring po ma
169a3(mdo sde): lon par klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /
169a4(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs brgya stong
169a5(mdo sde): dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /
169a6(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom
169a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa
169b1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa// 'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos
169b2(mdo sde): pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ / 'jig rten snal rnam par gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la
169b3(mdo sde): de ring bdag phyag 'tshal/ / dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags// 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba
169b4(mdo sde): bsregs shing myu gu bsregs/ / snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags// bsod nams zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la
169b5(mdo sde): bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ / khyod kyi zhal gyi smon mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kun da zla ba dung mdog 'dra// 'di na tshangs pa'i gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi
169b6(mdo sde): spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur/ / zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad// de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bded/
169b7(mdo sde): nyid du 'gyur// khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par bgyid// lha dang mi yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste// 'dod
170a1(mdo sde): chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid/ / dga' dang mgu bgyi bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid rtsi thar pa yang dag ston
170a2(mdo sde): pa lags/ / khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis te// khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus
170a3(mdo sde): thugs su chud/ / gang dag gi ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ci 'dra ba// thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud pas de slad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
170a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drung du glags lha'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed// khyod kyi thad du lhags par gyur kyang gnas las ma g.yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga'
170a5(mdo sde): ba/ mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpal dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzad// de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngoms
170a6(mdo sde): par 'dzin/ / mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa med dang ya ma brla dang zla ba 'dra ba dang // dbu ba grog sprin chu yi chu bur 'dra zhing sbru ma smig rgyu lta bur thugs su chud// gang la rgyu med/
170a7(mdo sde): rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyi chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de// de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga skyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os// gang gi don tu bskal pa bye ba khrag
170b1(mdo sde): khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa dang / / gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang // gang gi don tu sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang dul dang
170b2(mdo sde): bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi/ / rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul
170b3(mdo sde): dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus ma zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das
170b4(mdo sde): kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol
170b5(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris
170b6(mdo sde): pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po
170b7(mdo sde): rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad
171a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa dang / lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ sangs rgyas mthong
171a2(mdo sde): ba thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas 'thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang dang
171a3(mdo sde): ba'i shas che ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
171a4(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'tshal ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang / thos pa tshol bas chog ma 'tshal ba dang /
171a5(mdo sde): thos pa bsgrub pas mngon par 'phags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang / nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu ba dang /
171a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan
171a7(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang / chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang /
171b1(mdo sde): lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad bral ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sgring pa ma mchis
171b2(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / cho ga 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das rdza
171b3(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / brda sprod pa la mkhas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub
171b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
171b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
171b6(mdo sde): kyi klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / klu'i bdag po legs so legs so// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa ni/ klu'i bdag po khyod legs so//
171b7(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyis
172a1(mdo sde): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song
172a2(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas thams
172a3(mdo sde): cad srung ba dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brnyas par mi byed pa dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog par byed kyi/ gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtog ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang
172a4(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa
172a5(mdo sde): thams cad spong bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bsngags
172a6(mdo sde): pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / chos 'dod pa rnams g.yengs par mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang / sems can 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ klu'i bdag
172a7(mdo sde): po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar
172b1(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong zhing gzhan dag la yang sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong zhing nyams par mi byed pa
172b2(mdo sde): dang smon lam la bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje chen po skyed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
172b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/
172b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin
172b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa
172b6(mdo sde): thos pa der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / rgyud zhum pa med cing rgya chen po la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
172b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi
173a1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos la gces pa dang / gus pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang
173a2(mdo sde): dka' blo bde zhing gso sla la nges pa dang / nga rgyal med cing sri zhu byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/
173a3(mdo sde): ro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brlang zhing gya gyu med
173a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna bsal ba dang / gzhan dag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / bde bar sbyar ba la dga' ba ste/ klu'i bdag po chos gsum po//
173a5(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan
173a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi
173a7(mdo sde): sems mi gtong ba'i stobs dang / chos nyid la rton pa'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// klu'i
173b1(mdo sde): bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i stobs dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag po chos
173b2(mdo sde): de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa
173b3(mdo sde): la rton par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la mos pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang / yang dag pa'o las legs par rtsom pa ste/ klu'i bdag po
173b4(mdo sde): chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
173b5(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po gsum gyi yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa
173b6(mdo sde): dang bag yod par gnas pa ste/ de gnyis so// gzhan yang gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ste/ klu'i bdag po
173b7(mdo sde): chos de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur/ klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na/
174a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / sgra don du gnyer ba ma yin pa
