260a5(mdo sde): pas myos la/ bdag nyid ni tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / lta ba nyams/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la ni 'khrug pa dang / gnod pa byas te/ lus dang ngag dang / yid ma bsdams
260a6(mdo sde): shing sdig pa mang po byas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de la yang de dag gis mchod pa mang po byas so// des na khyed sems can dmyal bar ma song ste/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas
260a7(mdo sde): 'dir skyes nas 'di ltar sdom pas ma bsdams pa'i phyir/ khyed kyis srog gcod pa mang du byas shing / sdig pa'i las mang du byas la/ mang po dag kyang 'jigs par byas so// de nas bcom ldan
260b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag gis ci nas tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de dang / der dge slong du gyur nas las mngon par 'du
260b2(mdo sde): byed pa/ mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do// de dag gis kyang mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
260b3(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems ni dmu rgod gdul dka' zhing / srung dka' ba lags te/ der bdag gi sems brkam chags can du gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser
260b4(mdo sde): thub de ma mnyes par bgyis so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/ da slan chad rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtang bar 'tshal gyi/ sdig pa'i las ni mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag chos
260b5(mdo sde): kyi gtam gyis dga' ba bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su gtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas
260b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgya mtsho chen por sems can gyi don ji snyed bya dgos pa de dag thams cad mdzad nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po tshur shog/ da rang gi mal cha
260b7(mdo sde): dang stan rnams sdus shig/ nga ni rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba dang bcas par gdan las bzhengs nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas/ phyir yang
261a1(mdo sde): rin po che'i rjem skas rnams las bkod pa chen po dang / mchod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid chen pos gshegs nas/ mgur bsal te/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bzhes so//
261a2(mdo sde): de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' lha dang mis mchod pa/ lha mi/
261a3(mdo sde): dbang pos bsnyen bkur mi mchog deng phyag 'tshal// pad+ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla ba 'dra// dge ba'i chos kyis 'phags pa bde sbyin deng phyag 'tshal// gzugs mchog ston pa bsod nams
261a4(mdo sde): brgya yi mtshan dang ldan/ / yon tan ye shes bsags pa rnam 'dren deng phyag 'tshal// sbyin dang dul bas 'phags pa tshul khrims bzang po brtsegs// bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa mi mchog
261a5(mdo sde): deng phyag 'tshal/ / brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung ba bsam gtan blo gros sbyangs// shes rab mkha' mtshungs khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal// byams pas snyoms pa'i thugs ldan thugs rjes
261a6(mdo sde): 'gro la gzigs/ / 'dren pa thugs dgyes rtag tu pha rol gshegs// ka la bing+ka lta bur gsung snyan tshangs skad ston// gsung snyan ston pa khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal// bdud dpung 'joms
261a7(mdo sde): pa bdud stobs nges par 'joms mdzad pa/ / byang chub brtul zhugs sgrub pa srid gsum srid pas mchod// dri gsum dri ma sbyong ba rnam thar gsum ston pa// 'jig rten gsum grags khyod la de ring
261b1(mdo sde): mgos phyag 'tshal/ / bden pa'i brtul zhugs bzang po rtag tu chos kyis 'phags// rtag tu dgon pa spyod yul rtag tu ye shes skyong // nyon mongs dgra 'joms gzi brjid lhag pas gzi bskyed pa// pad+mas/
261b2(mdo sde): bu'i spyan mnga' deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal// lhun po'i rtse 'dra dgongs pa rdo rje lta bur brtan// dgongs pa sa 'dra'i yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro la stong pa ston pa zhi gnas pha rol phyin// rab tu
261b3(mdo sde): zhi ba'i thugs ldan khyod la skyabs su mchi/ / bdud rtsi dam pa ston pa 'gro min 'gro ba gcod// lha dang mis mchod khyod la de ri nga mgos phyag 'tshal// sa steng lha yul grags pa snyan dang grags pa 'phags
261b4(mdo sde): yon tan rgya chen mi zad yon tan 'byung gnas 'dud/ / ji skad gsungs bzhin mdzad cing ci skad mdzad bzhin gsung // ji skad spyod bzhin skul ba deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal// rga shi grol mdzad sman pa 'gro
261b5(mdo sde): bas bsnyen bkur ba/ / thar pa'i lam ston khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal// rgyu yi byed pa rab ston lta ba'i mun pa sel// lam mchog ston pa rgyal ba khyod la skyabs su mchi// rin chen sbyin pa gcig
261b6(mdo sde): bu chos kyi dga' ba gsung / / sa 'dra'i thugs ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// 'dren pa yon tan rgya mtsho yon tan las bstod pa'i// bdag gi bsod nams gang lags des ni khyod 'drar
261b7(mdo sde): shogade nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das la de skad bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das slar byung ste gshegs
262a1(mdo sde): pas/ de ni rgya mtsho chen po mi mdzes lags na/ ci nas bdag rgya mtsho mdzes par bgyid pa de lta bur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsten na legs so legs so// de skad ces
262a2(mdo sde): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od ldan ma chos bcu po 'di dag ni rgyan tu 'gyur ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
262a3(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen
262a4(mdo sde): po la gnas pa dang / bsam pa'i sbyor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pas dga' bar gnas pa dang / sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong
262a5(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi brten pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin du gnas pa dang / sngon
262a6(mdo sde): gyi dge ba chud mi za ba'i phyir dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos dang ldan zhing chos 'dod pa dang / phan pa'i dngos pos sems can thams cad la yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang /
262a7(mdo sde): gnyis su med pas gong du khyad par rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa la yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa ste/ 'od ldan ma chos bcu po de dag ni rgyan tu 'gyur
262b1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma lha mo khri dang lhan cig du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom
262b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po brgyan lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
262b3(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rgyan lags na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ byang chub kyi sems de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gis bskyed lags so// bcom
262b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas bzhin du/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du/ rtag tu
262b5(mdo sde): brtson pa kho nar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na yang / bkod pa thams cad nye bar bstan par 'tshal lo// chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad pa na yang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi
262b6(mdo sde): bkod pa bsgrub par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od ldan ma 'di ltar khyod kyis ni sangs rgyas khri la mchod pa byas so// 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa yang bstan to// dam pa'i
262b7(mdo sde): chos kyang yongs su bsrungs so/ / bod ldan ma khyod ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// khyod ni
263a1(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dgar skye bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyi dngos po brjes nas/
263a2(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha
263a3(mdo sde): mo 'od ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyid kyi lung bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ rgya mtsho'i rin po che dang / rin thang mnyam
263a4(mdo sde): pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag ni thub pa ye shes yon tan kun gyi
263a5(mdo sde): 'byung gnas de yis lung bstan te/ / bdag ni 'dren par 'gyur bar bdag la yid gnyis the tsom ci yang yod ma mchis// stong gsum sa gzhi thams cad rnam par zhugs shing zla ba sa la ltung yang gda'//
263a6(mdo sde): lha las lhag pa'i lhas mchod sangs rgyas phyin ci log gi tshig gsung yongs mi gda'// bsam pa byams pa brtson 'grus yul la thugs ni 'khrugs par 'gyur ba mi mnga' ltos// bdag ni stong pa'i
263a7(mdo sde): ye shes yul gyi chos rnams dag la gus par bgyid la ltos/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i yang dag spyod pa rnams dang ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' ltos// de yis 'dir ni bdag gi sems kyi yul bden
263b1(mdo sde): mkhyen nas de bzhin lung yang bstan/ / sman pa rab mchog bde sbyin sdug bsngal kun las grol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen skyob pa 'jigs pa rnams la 'jigs//
263b2(mdo sde): med sbyin mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba lam mchog dam pa ston mdzad lam ngan yongs su sbyong la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten rnam par gzigs la mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo//
263b3(mdo sde): 'dir na lha dang mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams thos pa dang // byang chub spyod cing byang chub bsam pa sems pa de dag brnyed pa legs par rnyed// de dag la ni ngan song ngan 'gro'i 'jigs
263b4(mdo sde): ba med de mi khom brgyad las yongs su grol/ / de dang de dag lha dang mi yi bde ba nges shing zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dgas
263b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa
263b6(mdo sde): mang po dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis lags na/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang ba mdzad na/ bdag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa la/ mchod pa'i las
263b7(mdo sde): cung zad tsam 'tshal te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba dang bcas par rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i bkod pa chen po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du bzhugs par gsol la/ bya rgod kyi phung
264a1(mdo sde): po'i ri la bskyal bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na stsol cig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshon
264a2(mdo sde): bu mthong dgas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i khang bzangs byin gyis brlabs nas/ der bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba dang bcas
264a3(mdo sde): par bzhugs par gsol nas/ steng gi bar snang las gshegs te/ klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang sil snyan byed/ pheg rdob/ glu dbyangs len cing me tog gi char chen po 'bebs la
264a4(mdo sde): lha'i spos dang / phye ma sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs bzhin du mthar gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bskyal to// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bu dang bcas/
264a5(mdo sde): chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ma 'byor par gyur pa
264a6(mdo sde): gang lags pa rnams bdag cag bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du/ de dang mtsham pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags la/ bcom ldan 'das
264a7(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad kyi bla na ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rin po che lags te/ mchod pa'i 'os lags na/ des na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i
264b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'byor pa 'am/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan/
264b2(mdo sde): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' nan tan byed pas/
264b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mchod pa nyon cig/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ bcos ma ma yin pa dang / g.yo med pa'i phyir ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs
264b4(mdo sde): su dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro// zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/
264b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la 'od snyoms pa'i phyir ro// tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir
264b6(mdo sde): ro/ / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu ba'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin cing / sbyangs pa'i yon
264b7(mdo sde): ta na thams cad yang dag par blangs pa mi 'dor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir ro// dben pa la dga' zhing bre mo gtam yongs su spong ba ni/ de bzhin
265a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ sems yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir ro// ji skad thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/
265a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro// bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par nye bar rtogs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
265a3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro// stong pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la nges par rtog pa dang / smon pa dang bral ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ rnam par thar
265a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgo mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro/ / rkyen 'di pa nyid la 'jug cing mthar lta ba sel ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ rtag pa dang / chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro//
265a5(mdo sde): ma byung ba dang / ma skyes par bzod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir ro// klu'i bdag po de ltar lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rtsom pa gang yin pa
265a6(mdo sde): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa ma yin gyi/ gang na lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rtsom pa med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa yin no// mngon
265a7(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa med pa dang / brang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / dri ma gsum gyi dri ma sel ba dang / khams gsum pa
265b1(mdo sde): la mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'jug pa dang / rig pa gsum gyi rig pa shes pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/
265b2(mdo sde): la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang me tog 'phreng pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
265b3(mdo sde): ba dan dang / na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa
265b4(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag kyang / ci de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po de ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa de nyid kyis yongs su sbyangs pa
265b5(mdo sde): yin gyis/ mchod pa de ni shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin no// klu'i bdag po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slob pa de dag ni/ 'phags/
265b6(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par grol ba la sems gnas kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
265b7(mdo sde): mchod pa byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pas/ bsod nams kyi tshogs gsogs pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis ye shes kyi tshogs gsogs
266a1(mdo sde): pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po shin tu brtsams pa'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / chos zab mo rgya chen po la sems bskyed pas/ bzod pa bskyed
266a2(mdo sde): ba thob pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin no// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i bram ze
266a3(mdo sde): dang rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / grong rdal pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / blon po dang / nang 'khor dang / sgo dpon dang / 'khor dang / tshong dpon
266a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su bshos gsol nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la gshegs so zhes thos nas der srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dang / rgyal po ma
266a5(mdo sde): skyes dgra g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
266a6(mdo sde): mgo bo sa phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
266a7(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na/ chab kyi tshogs de na mchis pa de gang du mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe/ dge slong me'i
266b1(mdo sde): khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang bar mthong na/ der chu'i phung po de gang du song / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
266b2(mdo sde): de ni ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de lta bur las su rung ba las gyur pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis/ de nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob
266b3(mdo sde): pa'i sems las su rung ba las gyur par 'dod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mkhas pa/ sems la dbang yod pa/ chos thams
266b4(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang phyug/ chos rnams la dbang yod pa ni de ltar mi 'dod dam/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe nga rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ chu de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bdag nyid chu'i nang na
266b5(mdo sde): gnas so snyam du 'dzin to/ / skams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho bskams par mthong ngo // ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa rnams rgyan thams cad kyis
266b6(mdo sde): brgyan pa de bzhin du/ klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis khyab par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi sems can thams cad kyang / gcig la gcig
266b7(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang / gnod pa'i sems med pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba med pas gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras
267a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de tsam du bsam
267a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ 'di ltar klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te/ de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos yun
267a3(mdo sde): ji srid cig nas ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la ni mchod pa bgyis/ yun ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
267a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra bar 'gyur lags/ bcom
267a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ yun ring ba tshad med pa'i snga rol/ de'i tshe de'i dus
267a6(mdo sde): nabaskal pa yid du 'ong zhing zhi ba zhes bya ba la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
267a7(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od rnam par
267b1(mdo sde): dag pa'i 'od gzer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung ste/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba yongs su dag pa de'i bkod pa byung ba de dag ni/ nga'i tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas su zin kyang
267b2(mdo sde): rgyas par bstan par nus par sla ba ma yin no/ / rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam
267b3(mdo sde): par dag pa'i 'od gzer rgyal po de la/ lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa de gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos so// skyes bu khyu/
267b4(mdo sde): mchog la ni mchod chen mang // dpag med rgya chen bsam yas byas zin gyis// 'gro ba dag la snying brtse bskyed nas kyang // rab mchog byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis// byang chub sems ni yang dag sgrub
267b5(mdo sde): byed gang / / de ni mchod mchog dam pa khyad par 'phags// de ni de bzhin gshegs rnams bkur sti yin// de ni phyi ma'i bsod nams gzi byin yin// / bam po bdun pa
267b6(mdo sde): ste tha ma'o/ / rgyal po chen po de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po// lhas btsa' des tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos te/ de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan
267b7(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od gzer rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ srog chags
268a1(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/
268a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gzugs la brkam dang sgra la rten pa dang // dri dang ro dang reg la gnas pa dang // 'dod la brkam dang bde la dga' ba yis// byang chub mchog 'di rtogs
268a3(mdo sde): bar mi nus so/ / le lo can dang dma' la brtson pa dang // ser sna can dang tshul khrims ma bsdams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang blo ni 'khrul pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so// /
268a4(mdo sde): rang gi bde ba thams cad spangs pa dang / 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu chos 'dod gang // de ni 'jig rten de 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs
268a5(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub la ni bdag zhugs pa/ / sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dbang btsugs te// ci nas bdag tshig log par mi 'gyur ba// de ltar sman slad spyod pa spyad pa bgyi// byang chub sems
268a6(mdo sde): ni bdag gis rmi lam thos/ / thos nas bdag ni byang chub mchog la zhugs// de yi slad du sangs rgyas mi yi mchog/ ye shes ldan pa de 'dra ba dag gis bgyi// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na//
268a7(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsang zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za na/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
268b1(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di nyid de'i tshe/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur to// de yang de'i dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod 'di skad du/ klu'i rgyal
268b2(mdo sde): po rgya mtsho 'di yun ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes zer ba de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di ni/ bskal pa
268b3(mdo sde): grangs med pa nyis brgya na/ bskal pa dpal gyi me tog ces bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
268b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha los sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
268b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la/ yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa de ni rin po che
268b6(mdo sde): sa yas spras par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa rin po che sna tshogs du mas bris shing mig mangs ris su rnam par phye la/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam ste/ ka tsa lin di ka'i gos bzhin
268b7(mdo sde): du 'jam zhing reg na bde la/ yangs shing thag gru che ste/ gling bye ba phrag 'bum dang ldan la/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang yid du 'ong ba ste/ lha dang mi mang po dag gis gang la/ gzhan
269a1(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi de dag gi yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya ba de na
269a2(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba dag 'byung bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shing ta la de dag gi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad las/ chos kyi sgo khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang po
269a3(mdo sde): dag 'byung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sgra ji snyed 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'i sgra 'am/ mi'i sgra 'am/ mi ma yin pa'i sgra 'am/ sprul pa'i sgra 'am/ bya'i sgra 'am/ rlung gi sgra yang rung ste/
269a4(mdo sde): sgra de dag thams cad chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang dben pa dang ldan pa dang /
269a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lta ba dang ldan
269a6(mdo sde): pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des na 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming chos kyi sgra grags
269a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang / mi gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' ba'i zas kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa
269b1(mdo sde): dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom med pa sha stag go/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la/ yon tan gyi tshogs mtha'
269b2(mdo sde): yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po de yang gang gi tshe chos ston par bzhed pa de'i tshe/ nyid kyi sku las 'od 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
269b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'od de las kyang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong gsung ba'i chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de na lha dang mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de yang mthong la/ chos
269b4(mdo sde): bstan pa de yang thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa la/ yon tan gyi tshogs
269b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa byas te/ rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis//
269b6(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyil na rin po che'i bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nam mkha'i dkyil nyid na/ seng ge'i khri la
269b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ lha dang mi de dag la chos ston to// de chos ston pa na/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa brgya stong dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
270a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can su yang chos la zhe 'gras pa med do// de na bdud sdig can dag dang / gzhan mu stegs can dag gi sgrar gdags pa yang med do// de bzhin
270a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro/ / de'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bgrang ba las 'das par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bkod pa ni bsam
270a3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab bo/ / chos bstan pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// zham 'bring ba 'khor byang chub sems dpa' yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
270a4(mdo sde): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / rnam par bsgrubs na
270a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid lags te/ de dag ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par 'grub pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi spyod pa ni mtha' yas pa lags so// de la byang chub sems
270a6(mdo sde): dpas ni ji srid du rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma bzung ba de srid du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
270a7(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad kyis ni/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/
270b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni yid la byed pa las 'byung ste/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par 'grub bo// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ klu'i
270b2(mdo sde): rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/ / klu'i bdag po gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bla na med pa yang dag par
270b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po chos
270b4(mdo sde): gang yang lung bstan du med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ klu'i bdag po sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang lung bstan
270b5(mdo sde): tu med dam/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can du gdags pa ni/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams su zad la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
270b6(mdo sde): ni lung bstan tu med do/ / rgyal po chen po ming dang gzugs la sems can du gdags par zad la/ ming dang gzugs ni lung bstan tu med do// rgyu dang lta ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed
270b7(mdo sde): ba la sems can du gdags par zad na/ rgyu dang lta ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa de de la yang lung bstan tu med do// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
271a1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang lung bstan tu med do/ / rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin la/ stong pa
271a2(mdo sde): nyid ni lung bstan du med do/ / rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
271a3(mdo sde): med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni lung bstan du med do// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ming med pa
271a4(mdo sde): dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos thams cad ming dang mtshan mas ston par mdzad la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ming dang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa can
271a5(mdo sde): yang ma yin no/ / rgyal po chen po lung bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten brda sprad par zad de/ 'di la gang lung bstan par bya ba'i ming chos gang yang / nang ngam phyi rol na mi dmigs so// rgyal
271a6(mdo sde): pos smras pa/ klu'i bdag po bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung bstan pa med dam/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod pa de yang skad cig pa/ zad pa'i mtshan
271a7(mdo sde): nyid/ mi zad pa'i mtha' can/ yang dag pa'i mthar nges pa/ mnyam pa'i mtha' can/ gnyis su med pa'i mthar nges pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o// yang dag pa'i
271b1(mdo sde): mtha' ni gtan du mi 'byung ba'i mtha'o/ / mtha' can gang yin pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams so// de'i mtha' can ni rnam par grol ba'i mtha'o// gang mtha' de'i sgor zhugs
271b2(mdo sde): ba ni gang du yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ / gang mngon par zhen pa med pa de ni tha snyad kyis brda la chags pa med do// ma chags na grol bar 'gyur ro// grol na phyin chad mi rgyu rab tu mi rgyu'o// mi rgyu rab tu mi
271b3(mdo sde): rgyu na/ gang du yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro// blo ma nyams na thams cad las nges par 'byung bar mthong ste/ ji ltar rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar yang mthong ngo // gang gi tshe rnam par mi mthong ba de'i tshe//
271b4(mdo sde): gnyis su mi 'byed do// gnyis su med pa la gnas na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'jug go// mnyam pa nyid la zhugs na/ mtho bar yang mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// mtho ba yang med/ dma'
271b5(mdo sde): ba yang med na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyis rab tu phye ba'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de la bzod pa gang yin pa dang / lung bstan pa gang yin pa dang / gang lung bstan par bya ba dang / sus lung
271b6(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / ci'i phyir lung bstan pa'i chos de dag thams cad chos mnyam pa dang / chos med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su nges pa dang / brda med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos
271b7(mdo sde): po med pa dang bral ba dang / gnyis su med pa'i mtha' can de dag gi don yongs su gzhal nas/ chos gang yang bgrang bar mi byed do// dper na/ nam mkha' ni bgrang du med cing bgrang ba las
272a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa ste/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgyas mi
272a2(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces
272a3(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar yang mi che la/ dka' ba yang ma yin gyi/ las
272a4(mdo sde): dang po pa gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni de dag gi ches ngo mtshar ba dang / ches dka' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang
272a5(mdo sde): chub ni de ltar mos par dka' ba ste/ de la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'jug par mi 'gyur/ 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ mos par mi 'gyur/ yid ches par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ rgyal po chen po rnam grangs
272a6(mdo sde): 'dis kyang gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o// rgyal po
272a7(mdo sde): chen po gzhan yang 'di ji snyam du sems skyes bu gang gis nam mkha' gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa 'di ni/ gzugs can du ston par byed na/ ci de dka' bar byed pa yin nam/ gsol pa/
272b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mchog tu dka' lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu dka' lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos 'di lta bur zab pa zab par snang ba/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa/ bdag med pa/
272b2(mdo sde): sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gso ba med pa/ gang zag med pa/ rgyu ba med pa 'di la mos la mos nas kyang de kho na bzhin du sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin te/ de dag ni
272b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'thun pa'i dge ba dang grogs dang mdza' bshes yin no/ / de dag gis ni sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir/ chos ston nus so// de dag gis ni byang chub kyi snying po
272b4(mdo sde): mchog dam pa la 'dug nas/ bdud kyi dpung bye ba phrag brgya byams pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus kyis gzhom par nus so// de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa dang
272b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
272b6(mdo sde): nus so/ / de dag gis ni sems can thams cad brda sprad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin
272b7(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar nus so/ / de dag gis ni phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar bcad pa dang / mu stegs can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / dgra
273a1(mdo sde): thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ chos kyi drung 'dud nus so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bsam pa grub cing brnag pa dang / yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te/
273a2(mdo sde): rang gi lung bstan pa thos nas/ bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bdud rnams sde bcas dpung bcas des bcom
273a3(mdo sde): zhing lta ba ngan pa'i phyogs kun bshig nas ni/ thub pa chen pos chos kyi char phab ste/ 'jig rten thams cad bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/ khyod ni chos rgyal mi 'jigs stsol ba lags// 'dam/
273a4(mdo sde): las rgal te 'jigs med 'gram na bzhugs// 'jig rten mig ste lam mchog ston pa po// skye bo skyabs ma mchis pa'i mgon po lags// sman pa'i rgyal khyod zug rngu 'byin pa yi// sman parga
273a5(mdo sde): shi med pa'i sman tshol ba/ / ci nas phyin chad nang rnams mi 'byung bar// nad dang rgabs gzer rnams gso mdzad pa// khyod ni ston skyabs bla ma gcig pu lags// gtan du bde ba sbyin pa khyod
273a6(mdo sde): nyag cig/ khyod ni ru skya 'dzin pa don dam mkhyen pa lags// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni zlog mdzad pa// lha yi lha ste 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso// 'jig rten kun gyi sgron mar gyur pa lags/ khyod
273a7(mdo sde): dang 'jal na 'jig rten chen brgal/ / mi rnams kyi ni mog mchog khyod nyagacig/ ye shes gzugs dang pha rol gnon pa yis// thub dbang khyod 'dra su yang ma mchis te// khyod ni lha rab
273b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ / ston pa po skye thar pa'i lam mtshon lags// khyod ni thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen mchog/ 'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni khyod mgos// kun mkhyen sred bral/
273b2(mdo sde): rnam grol dpa' ba dang / ye shes mchog brnyes khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' rnam par dag/ gzugs med gzung du ma mchis 'dus ma bgyis// de bzhin chos rnams dri
273b3(mdo sde): med rnam par dag/ 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan// yod dang med par lta ba spangs nas kyang // rnam dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen dang bcas shing rgyu dang
273b4(mdo sde): bcas pa ste/ / sems can ma mchis gang zag srog ma mchis// gzod nas rnam dag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// sgyu ma sma gi rgyu chu zla 'dra ba ste// shin tu dag pa nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// gnas pa ma
273b5(mdo sde): mchis klog dang 'dra ba'i tshul/ / sngon gyi mtha' stong phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong // skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa'i ngo bo stong // 'dir ni de dag dngos med dngos med min// 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin ma
273b6(mdo sde): mchis stong / / chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags de// sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo lags// sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang // sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin
273b7(mdo sde): ngo bo de/ / sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang // de ni chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo nyid// chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi ngo bo rang bzhin de// sangs rgyas
274a1(mdo sde): zhing gi rang bzhin ngo bo gang / sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo de// sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo gang // de ni chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/ chos rnams kun/
274a2(mdo sde): la rnam par dag pa 'di// gang tshe byang chub sems dpas de ltar mthong // de nas rgyal rnams ye shes dam pa yid// byang chub mchog tu de ni lung ston mdzad// chos rnams
274a3(mdo sde): brda dang ming dang tha snyad tsam/ mnyam pa lags te mi bden ming du btags/ de dag sngan chad lus kyang ma thob ste// de dag gi ni ming rnams kun tu brjod// ming ma mchis par ming ni rnam par
274a4(mdo sde): brtags/ / chos rnams stong ste rang bzhin rnam par dag/ 'jig rten 'du shes mkhas par rig nas ni// tha snyad tsam la kun tu spyod par bgyi// chos kun sgyu ma bzhin du rig nas kyang // mi
274a5(mdo sde): bden snying po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra/ rnam smin sgyu dang nying mtshams sbyor ba tsam/ de la bden pa'i 'du shes yong mi bgyi// chos kun slu bar bgyid cing 'jig pa lags// sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ste
274a6(mdo sde): mi bden pa/ mgal me'i 'khor lo gzugs brnyan 'dra ba lags// rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rmongs par bgyid// byis pas bdag dang bdag gir 'dir brtags nas// blun po sred pas gzir ba 'dir rmongasate
274a7(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khor ba na/ / sdug bsngal gyis non zhi ba thob mi 'gyur// 'gro ba'i 'jug pa 'di ni yang dag min// gang gi 'jug pa de ni ma mchis te// 'arlo ba'i 'jig rten lta ba
274b1(mdo sde): gti mug mdongs/ / rgyun tu yang dang yang du sdug bsngal rnyed// lha rnams sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa/ mi rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags// dmyal ba dag gi sdug bsngal gnod
274b2(mdo sde): pa rnams/ / gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags// yi dgas sdug bsngal 'di na bkres dang skom// 'jig rten thams cad sdug bsngal rnams su nub// skyabs med gyur dang rten med
274b3(mdo sde): gyur pa yi/ / 'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad gzigs nas ni// drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rje can// sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol phyir 'byung bar mdzad// byang chub sems dpa'
274b4(mdo sde): bskal mang bye bar yang / / rtul zhugs brtan zhing pha rol phyin la brtson// srid ni mchis pa de 'dra mkhyen nas ni// 'dam las rgal te sems can rnams kyang 'dul// gang tshe chos rnams
274b5(mdo sde): gsog dang gsob tu gzigs/ / nam mkha' chang stong 'dra zhing snying po med// de dag bdag gi ngo bo ma mchis pas// bdag med dngos med dngos po med ma lags// mtha' rnams kun tu lta
274b6(mdo sde): ba kun spang na/ / byang chub rdul med rnam dag thob par 'gyur// skye dang rga dang gnod par bgyi ba gang // 'chi dang gnas pa gang lags su yang med// gang 'dir skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi// shed
274b7(mdo sde): las skyes dang shed bu de ma mchis/ / 'di na bdag dang bdag gi ma mchis te// gang zag shed skyes shed bu yong ma mchis// 'di brdzun bdag po ma mchis dbang ma mchis// 'tsho ba'i 'jin/
275a1(mdo sde): rten sgyu ma lta bur 'jug/ byed pa ma mchis tshor ba po ma mchis// 'on kyang las mchis 'bras bu'i don yang mchis// 'gro ba'i las kyis rkyen gyis rang bzhin 'byung
275a2(mdo sde): phan tshun du ni rgyu las rten par 'dus/ / dge dang mi dge'i las gang bgyid pa dang // gang zhig bsgoms dang gang du bgyis// yul na ma mchis phyogs na ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong 'on kyang
275a3(mdo sde): rnam par smin/ / nang dang slad rol par ni mi gnas te// chos rnams gang du'ang 'phangs pa yongs ma mchis// de dag gang la'ang rten pa ma mchis la// rnam par smin pa slu bar yong mi bgyid//
275a4(mdo sde): skyes pa mi mnga' 'gag pa mnga' ma lags// mkhas pa rnams ni go bar bgyi slad du// nyan pa la ni smra bas tshig kyang bstan// lta ba rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du bstan// gang gi 'du shes 'du shes
275a5(mdo sde): can ma mchis/ / mya ngan 'das mchis su yang zhi ma mchis// skye ba ma mchis mtha' gang mtha' de lags// bdag gi bdag med mtha' ni nam mkha'i mtha'// kun gyi mtha' ni mnyam par thob pa des//
275a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab dam pa thob// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang ni// skye ba'i mtha' dang skye ba ma mchis mtha'// mtha' kun de ltar mnyam par mthong ba dang // chags med mtha'
275a7(mdo sde): yi sgo shes ldan pa dang / / dus gsum mtha' rnams la ni ma chags des// rgyal ba rnams kyi rigs mchog thob par 'gyur// 'gro ba bcings las rnam par grol mdzad nas// zhi mchog mya ngan
275b1(mdo sde): 'das pa rnyes par 'gyur/ / 'gro kun rmi lam lta bur des gzigs nas// 'dir ni ming dang gzugs la sems ma chags// chos kun la ni rnam par dag pa'i mig/ zhi ba dang ni mig g.yo
275b2(mdo sde): mi 'gul thob/ / chos rnams thams cad sgra med skang me dag gzung du med cing dngos med rnam par dag/ de bzhin rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyi gdung // zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid de smon pa spangs// skyon med rims nad cing mya
275b3(mdo sde): ngan bral/ / spros ku nye bar zhi zhing bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba marlog rnams kyi ni chos 'di dag/ gzung bral rang bzhin sgra dang skad ma mchis// 'gro la sman slad skyes bu dam pa yis// de yang yi ge
275b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi gleng gzhi bstan/ / gang gis 'jig rten bla ma rang 'byung mthong // mthong nas kyang ni yid la dang bgyid dang // khyad par 'gro ba'i chos kyang nyan pa yi// lha dang mi rnams rnyed pa legs
275b5(mdo sde): par rnyed/ / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su chos 'di ni// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan// gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'gyur ba rnams// thams cad kyang ni mnyam
275b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos su 'gyur/ / sgra rnams thams cad brag cha tsam du byas// de ni brjod na rna bar grag par 'gyur// de ni tshul bzhin lam gyi rgyur 'gyur te// chos so 'tshal gyi slad du btags pa tsam// chos kun
275b7(mdo sde): sgyu ma 'dra zhing g.yog lags te/ / de dag sems can slad du rnam mang phye// de dag dang bzhin ngo bo gang yin pa// de ni rnams kyang rnam par dbyer mi rung // 'jig rten na ni sangs rgyas chos rgyal mchog
276a1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbang phyug sun rig kun mkhyen pa/ / ston pa de la slob na de bzhin du// 'phags pa kun gyis de nyid don kyang rtogs// byung ba gang lags pa dang da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa na byung
276a2(mdo sde): gang lags pa/ / thams cad la yang thub pa skyes mchog gi/ ye shes 'jug ste thogs pa yong mi mnga'// skyes bu dam pa de yis de ring bdag/ dog ma mchis par byang chub mchog lung bstan
276a3(mdo sde): bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur/ / bdag la som nyis ma mchis dogs ma mchis// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
276a4(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub/ ci nas yun ring du gnas par
276a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir zung shig/ khyed kyi nang nas su dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar spro/ de nas der byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lha'i bu khri stan las langs
276a6(mdo sde): tebacom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung
276a7(mdo sde): bar 'tshal lo/ / rgyas par yang bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos bsgrub pa ji lta bus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin
276b1(mdo sde): par byed/ / de nas der byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos/
276b2(mdo sde): gzung bar 'tshal na/ ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgrub na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang
276b3(mdo sde): chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par ltas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mtshams ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid du mthong na/
276b4(mdo sde): ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgrub na/ nga'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' lta ba med kyis
276b5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong na/ slob pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /
276b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma mthong na/ ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la
276b7(mdo sde): khas 'che ba med par shin tu gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rang bzhin ci yang 'tshal cing mi 'dzin na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lag sa ma/ bka' stsal pa/
277a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mig gis mi lta/ sems kyis mi gtod/ dran pa mi skyed na/ ci bdag
277a2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'i brjod du med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyang mi ston/ chos ma lag
277a3(mdo sde): pa yang mi ston/ bdag la chos kyi sgra yang mi 'byung / chos kyi 'du shes la yang rtog par mi bgyid na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhi no// /
277a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ming med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag gang gis ming dang / mtshan ma yang mi tan lags na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ rigs kyi bu de ni re
277a5(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ gang la 'dzin pa'i chos rnams dang
277a6(mdo sde): chos ma lags pa rnams mi mthong na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i stabs kyis 'gro
277a7(mdo sde): bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad la/ mi dmigs mi g.yo mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/ tso bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de
277b1(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la/ bdud kyi gul gyi rjes su mchis la bdud kyi yul la yang sangs rgyas kyi rjes
277b2(mdo sde): su mchis na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lag sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos
277b3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyang 'byed par mi bgyid/ sems can gyi khams la ma gtogs par yang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
277b4(mdo sde): bu de ni de bzhin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos ci yang mi dmigs la/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang chos kyi sgra yang byung na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin
277b5(mdo sde): pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' kun nas bsrungs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdud kyi zhags pas kyang ma bcings la/ byang chub sem
277b6(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod ma/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos tham
277b7(mdo sde): cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar yang dag par 'du ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid ro gcig par 'tshal na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lag sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// lha'i bu mtshan bzang
278a1(mdo sde): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang skye yang skye la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'byung ba yang mi 'dzin/ 'byung yang 'byung la/ de sems dang yid
278a2(mdo sde): du dogs par yang mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no// lha'i bu dri ma med pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad dri ma ma
278a3(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / snyigs ma ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar rig nas/ rgyu las byung ba las rnam par grol bar mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
278a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no// lha'i bu sems can sgrol gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyang sgrol bar bgyid la/ bdag ma mchis pa yang 'tshal/ bsgral nas kyang 'dzud par bgyid
278a5(mdo sde): la/ tshul rol dang pha rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no// lha'i bu dbang byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos
278a6(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang yang thob la/ chos gang yang skyed par yang mi bgyid/ 'gag par yang mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no// lha'i bu rgyal
278a7(mdo sde): po bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can thams cad sems can mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad chos mnyam pa dang / zhing thams cad zhing mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
278b1(mdo sde): cad sangs rgyas mnyam par rjes su song na/ de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no// lha'i bu legs par sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
278b2(mdo sde): chos ci yang mi sem shing spros par mi bgyid de/ mtshan mar bgyid na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ de ni de bzhin no// sring mo ut+pa las
278b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lags par 'tshal/ 'on kyang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyan/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam
278b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sring mo de ni de bzhin no// bu mo mu tig 'phreng gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bud med kyi chos rnams kyang ma dmigs/ skyes pa'i chos rnams kyang ma dmigs te/
278b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang lags pa de/ bud med dang / skyes pa'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid lags la/ ci chos de dag kyang chos kyang ma lag/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lag te
278b6(mdo sde): de'i slad du 'di ltar bdag ni skyed par mi bgyid/ khas len par yang mi bgyid na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ bu mo de ni de bzhin no// bu mo rin chen gyis gsol
278b7(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang ma mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi go ca yang bdag gis bgos/ de dag kyang gtan du bdag gis
279a1(mdo sde): ma mthong na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ dka' stsal pa/ bu mo de ni de bzhin no// bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
279a2(mdo sde): bdag chos thams cad la yang / chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed la/ sems can thams cad la yang sems can gyi 'du shes mi skyed/ chos thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la
279a3(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi khongs su yang chos thams cad 'dus par yang dag par mthong la/ de dag gis khongasu yang ma zhen par yang dag par mthong na/ bcom ldan
279a4(mdo sde): 'das bdag de ltar brtson na/ ci dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo khyod de ltar bsgrub na/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no//
279a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'dra la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsam mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo rnams
279a6(mdo sde): kyis 'dir rnam pa dang / sgra dang / brda sna tshogs kyis chos nyid de kho na glengs te/ chos gang la yang 'gal bar mi bgyid la/ chos thams cad kyang byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni
279a7(mdo sde): ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin te/ bu mo 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa ston pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas
279b1(mdo sde): mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/ ko'u shi ka gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgyas par bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
279b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung ba de dag la bstabs pa'i phyir khyod la gtad do// de ltar byas na khyod kyis de bzhin
279b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa'i mchog byas par 'gyur ro/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags so// 'di ni bdag gis de bzhin
279b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kho nas rgyas par bgyi'o/ / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po de dag la yang bstabs par 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
279b5(mdo sde): bdag gis de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bka' drin bsab pa'i rngo mo thog ste/ 'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phan gdags pas/ phan btags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
279b6(mdo sde): 'das gzhan yang ci nas bdag bdud dang / phyir rgol ba nges par bcom nas/ 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab du
279b7(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi
280a1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs ngas bstan par bya ste/ rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyang shin tu tshar gargyad par
280a2(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ de sazhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ye/ b+ha ya bi gi te/ b+hA ya bi sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha ya dA de/ ni ru pad dra be/ a nA ku le/ a
280a3(mdo sde): ku la sang sho d+ha ne/ a gra he/ a bi b+ha dre/ a ka la pe/ ad ts+tshata/ shu b+ha te dzi/ te dzo ba ti/ me hA te dze/ u pa shA me/ me t+yu ga ta/ sho Sha ya mA ne/ sad ta dar sha ne/ a bi rud d+he
280a4(mdo sde): sa hi ta aR+She/ an+ma sid+d+hi/ a mri ta pa te/ sA ga re/ sA ga ra ba ti/ a b+hi de/ badz+ra san d+hi/ ak+Sha ye/ ak+Sha ta/ pra b+he/ dzA ti bi sho d+ha ne/ shu d+he shu b+he/ a ba b+ha sa ba ti/ sa ma pra yo ge/ sa ma
280a5(mdo sde): tsad te/ a nud ta re/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne/ shi la bi sho d+ha ne/ a na ti kra ma Ne/ a sang hA r+ye/ ni gr-i hI tim/ mA ra ba lam/ pa rA dza yo d+hiSh+To ga tA nAn/ dzA lA nAn/ d+ha ra mo wA nAn/ sang gr-ihI tAn/
280a6(mdo sde): d+harmA tA nAn/ ud gA Ti tAn/ d+harma nid+ha nAn// ko'u shi ka rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
280a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs so/ / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis ni/ rtsod pa'i bdag po bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de nas
280b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ rgyas par bgyi'o//
280b2(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba ni/ dkar po'i chos legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las bsngags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
280b3(mdo sde): bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba rjes su dran zhing rjes su srung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/
280b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu bsod rnams 'phags kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bzung na/ bsod nams ji

286b6(mdo sde): ba dang / de'i sems rtsod pa med cing / 'thab pa med pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems drang zhing mnyen la nges pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i skye bor grags par 'gyur ba dang /
286b7(mdo sde): sems cad thams cad la bde bar dga' zhing / byams pa'i sems phan pa'i dngos po la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing dang ba mang la/ skye bo mang pos bsti stang bya bar
287a1(mdo sde): 'gyu ra ba dang / sems sbrum ning las su rung bas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du srub thob pa mi dkon par 'gyur ba ste/ klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ li
287a2(mdo sde): bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad po de dag thob bo/ / gnod sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems thogs pa
287a3(mdo sde): med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas mi ngoms par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcu thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
287a4(mdo sde): bsam pa dag par 'gyur zhing grogs po dag pa rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin/ lhar sangs rgyas 'dzin gyi/ gzhan
287a5(mdo sde): lhar mi 'dzin pa yin/ ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bral bas lta ba drang ba yin/ grogs lha dang mi yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa grogs su mi 'gyur ba yin/ bsod nams
287a6(mdo sde): sbyangs pas khyad par 'gro ba yin log pa thams cad med pas/ 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral zhing sdig pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ yang dag
287a7(mdo sde): par song zhing yang dag par zhugs pas sgrib pa med par mthong ba yin/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du mi khom pa dang bral ba yin te/ klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yon
287b1(mdo sde): tan gyi chos bcu po de dag thob bo/ / log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon
287b2(mdo sde): du 'gyur te/ mngon par shes pa myur ba'i de bzhi ni gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa nas// blan
287b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba dang rten to/ / bzlog na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te/ de dag shas cher bstan cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas na sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu'o//
287b4(mdo sde): 'bring ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi rgyu'o// chung ngu ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyu'o// klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas na/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gan
287b5(mdo sde): su khrid do/ / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ tshe thung ba dang nad mang bar 'gyur ba'o// ma byin len
287b6(mdo sde): pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas kal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub
287b7(mdo sde): ste longs spyod chung ba dang / thun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do//
288a1(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ g.yog 'khor brtan du mi rung ba dang / 'granar+tha

288a3(mdo sde): na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ skur pa mang ba dang / gzhan gyis bslu bar 'gyur ba'o// phra mas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin/

288a5(mdo sde): pos ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du smras na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/
288a6(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa dang / 'thab mo'i tshig tu 'gyur ba'o// tshig bkyil pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// kashin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi
288a7(mdo sde): rnams tsamang du rgyas na yang / nam mar smin pa gnyis mngon par gyur ste/ gzung bar 'os pa'i tshogs yin pa dang / mdzes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o// 'anab sems kyis ni sems can rgyal bar brid do//

288b5(mdo sde): bsdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs
288b6(mdo sde): spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang gzhan gyis gnod pa bya ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po ma byin par

289a3(mdo sde): ma la su yang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ / klu'i bdag po brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /

289a6(mdo sde): pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo/ / klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /

289b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag par lta ba'i khyim du skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
289b7(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / byang chub sems bskyed pa dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de ltar dge ba bcu'i las
290a1(mdo sde): kyi lam 'di dag sbyin pas brgyan na/ 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na// sangs rgyas kyi chos bam cad kyi don tu smom
290a2(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid bzod pas brgyan na/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
290a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyar te/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan na bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi brgyan na/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang /
290a4(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyan na/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyan na/ sem
290a5(mdo sde): can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ / snying rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bas brgyan na/ zhum pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro//
290a6(mdo sde): btang snyoms kyis brgyan na/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye
290a7(mdo sde): bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong bas brgyan na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dag
290b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan na/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba
290b2(mdo sde): dang rmongs pa med pa dang / sems las su rung ba la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyan na/ rdzi ba med cing dngul ba dang / nyes pa thams
290b3(mdo sde): cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// lam gyis brgyan na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro// /

290b5(mdo sde): brgyan na/ 'a dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po mdor na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa ba ni

291b6(mdo sde): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub
291b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu
292a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'

292a3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsab pan d+hes ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
292a4(mdo sde): rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan dro d+ha rA dA ri ka bya kar/ na ma ma hA mA na sUH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
